name: AmbiDome V1
description:
Enter the AmbiDome and turn the different audiosources on and off to experience the impact of immersive audio in VR.

Our first demo-reel which emphasizes the importance of audio in VR. The concept is plain simple, just turn sounds on and off in the dome and experience what sound adds to the image.

Sound and Music by Jelmer Althuis.
